com.simplechat.util
Class MathHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.simplechat.util.MathHelper

public class MathHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Class containing extra math-based commands which don't exist in Java.lang.Math, such as clamp().

Constructor Summary
MathHelper()
          Creates a new MathHelper.
